item.title: トルコのメディア規制当局、VOAのデジタル放送局に72時間以内に放送免許を申請するよう指示、さもなくばウェブサイトVOA Türkçeへのアクセスはブロックされる（Bianet)
item.description:
Bianet:
Turkey's media regulator gives VOA's digital outlet in Turkey 72 hours to apply for a broadcasting license, or access to its website VOA Türkçe will be blocked  —  The Radio and Television Supreme Council (RTÜK) gave VOA Türkçe 72 hours to make an application for a license.

item.title: ハリウッドのストライキが続く中、SAG-AFTRAのメンバーと同調者が火曜日にニューヨークのアマゾンとHBOのオフィスの前でピケを張った（Sean Piccoli/Deadline）
item.description:
Sean Piccoli / Deadline:
SAG-AFTRA members and sympathizers picketed outside of Amazon's and HBO's offices in New York on Tuesday as the Hollywood strikes continue  —  - Dispatches From The Picket Lines: Latine Writers & Actors In L.A. & NYC; ‘Roseanne’ And ‘The Conners’ Teams Reunite At Radford

item.title: YouTubeとUMGがAIのライセンス供与を模索し、グーグルがAIを訓練するためにウェブをスクラップし、訴訟が著作権法を根底から覆す恐れがあることから、グーグルの政策のジレンマを分析（Nilay Patel/The Verge）
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
An analysis of Google policy dilemmas as YouTube and UMG explore AI licensing, Google scrapes the web to train AI, and lawsuits threaten to upend copyright law  —  Google has made clear it is going to use the open web to inform and create anything it wants, and nothing can get in its way.

item.title: スポーツポッドキャスティングネットワーク「Blue Wire」がコミュニティ資金調達ラウンドを開始、評価額2,600万ドルで100万ドルを募集、2022年の売上は800万ドル、500万ドルの赤字（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sports podcasting network Blue Wire opens up a community fundraising round, seeking $1M at a $26M valuation; in 2022, it had $8M in revenue and a $5M loss  —  Blue Wire, a sports podcast company founded in 2018, will open up a community fundraising round on Tuesday, allowing podcasters …

item.title: 専門家は、メタとおそらくグーグルによるカナダでのニュースのブロックは、AIが生成する「ニュース」サイトの増加による誤報の影響を悪化させると警告している（Kevin Jiang/Toronto Star）。
item.description:
Kevin Jiang / Toronto Star:
Experts warn that blocking of news in Canada by Meta and possibly Google will worsen misinformation effects of the growing number of AI-generated “news” sites  —  As it becomes increasingly difficult to trust what we read online, experts say it's critical to learn how to tell real media from fake — here's how.

item.title: アクセル・シュプリンガー、社内データをベルリナー・ツァイトゥング紙と共有したとして提訴していた元ビルト紙EICのユリアン・ライヒェルト氏と和解（Klaus Lauer/Reuters）
item.description:
Klaus Lauer / Reuters:
Axel Springer settles with Julian Reichelt, the former Bild EIC it had sued for sharing internal data with newspaper Berliner Zeitung  —  German publishing magnate Axel Springer has agreed to an out-of-court settlement in a civil lawsuit against Julian Reichelt, the former editor-in-chief …

item.title: Wirecutterが劣化したかどうかは、模倣品の台頭、2011年以降のインターネットの変化、機関への信頼の低下を考えると判断が難しい（Charlie Warzel/The Atlantic）
item.description:
Charlie Warzel / The Atlantic:
Whether Wirecutter has deteriorated is difficult to determine given the rise of copycats, changes to the internet since 2011, and falling trust in institutions  —  Longtime fans have turned on the product-recommendation website.  An evolving internet may be to blame.

item.title: コックス、ストリーミングサービス「Neighborhood TV」を開始、1ゾーンあたり40～50万人の小規模視聴者をターゲットに、オリジナルおよびライセンスされたローカルニュースコンテンツを含む（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Cox launches streaming service Neighborhood TV, aiming to serve small audiences of 400-500K per zone and include original and licensed local news content  —  Local broadcast company Cox Media Group is launching a hyper-local streaming network called Neighborhood TV, in partnership with McClatchy …

item.title: TikTokが検索結果への広告掲載を開始、"Search Ads Toggle "と呼ばれる製品で、ブランドは "ネガティブ・キーワード "を追加することで、一部のクエリの隣に広告が表示されないようにできる（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
TikTok launches ads in search results, a product called “Search Ads Toggle”; brands can add “Negative Keywords” so their ads don't appear next to some queries  —  TikTok announced today it's adding a new place for advertisers to reach its audience: within the search results page.

item.title: ウェルネス企業For Themが、クィア系オンラインマガジンAutostraddleを株式交換で買収（Alex Cooper/Advocate）
item.description:
Alex Cooper / Advocate:
Wellness company For Them acquires queer online magazine Autostraddle in an all-equity deal  —  Iconic queer online magazine Autostraddle has been acquired by wellness company For Them, the companies announced Tuesday.  The site will now become Autostraddle by For Them.

item.title: 著名メディア幹部らが300万ドルを集め、オープンなインターネットと独立した報道に焦点を当てた「ニュース・テクノロジー・イノベーションセンター」を設立（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Prominent media execs and others raise ~$3M to launch the Center for News, Technology & Innovation, which focuses an open internet and independent press  —  A group of prominent media, tech and research executives have raised nearly $3 million to launch an independent policy research center focused …

item.title: IBMは、Weather.comやビジネス向けサービスを含む気象事業を、非公開投資会社フランシスコ・パートナーズに非公開の金額で売却する予定（Brody Ford/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Brody Ford / Bloomberg:
IBM plans to sell its weather business, including Weather.com and business-oriented offerings, to private equity firm Francisco Partners for an undisclosed sum  —  IBM's consumer-facing weather services such as Weather.com and business-oriented offerings will be acquired …

item.title: 元EICのジェイソン・ケブラー氏を含むマザーボードOB4人が、ハッキングなどを扱うテック系出版社「404 Media」を創刊、購読料は月10ドルまたは年100ドル（ケイティ・ロバートソン／ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Four Motherboard alumni, including ex-EIC Jason Koebler, launch tech publication 404 Media to cover hacking and more; subscriptions are $10/month or $100/year  —  They are joining a recent boom of publications owned and operated by the reporters and editors themselves.

item.title: Metaは、ユーザーが投稿したり、他の投稿と交流したり、フィードを見たりできるThreadsウェブアプリを数日中にリリースする予定だ（Jay Peters/The Verge）。
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Meta is rolling out a Threads web app over the next few days that will let users post, interact with other posts, and look at the feed  —  Meta is finally launching a much more capable web app for Threads, the company announced on Tuesday.  You'll be able to post, interact with other posts …
